sections.text:
RCW 36.900.010

Continuation of existing law.

The provisions of this title insofar as they are substantially the same as statutory provisions repealed by this chapter, and relating to the same subject matter, shall be construed as restatements and continuations, and not as new enactments.

The provisions of this title insofar as they are substantially the same as statutory provisions repealed by this chapter, and relating to the same subject matter, shall be construed as restatements and continuations, and not as new enactments.

[ 1963 c 4 s 36.98.010. Formerly RCW 36.98.010.]

sections.number: 36.900.020 - Title, chapter, section headings not part of la
sections.text:
RCW 36.900.020

Title, chapter, section headings not part of law.

Title headings, chapter headings, and section or subsection headings, as used in this title do not constitute any part of the law.

Title headings, chapter headings, and section or subsection headings, as used in this title do not constitute any part of the law.

[ 1963 c 4 s 36.98.020. Formerly RCW 36.98.020.]

sections.number: 36.900.030 - Invalidity of part of title not to affect remai
sections.text:
RCW 36.900.030

Invalidity of part of title not to affect remainder.

If any provision of this title, or its application to any person or circumstance is held invalid, the remainder of the title, or the application of the provision to other persons or circumstances is not affected.

If any provision of this title, or its application to any person or circumstance is held invalid, the remainder of the title, or the application of the provision to other persons or circumstances is not affected.

[ 1963 c 4 s 36.98.030. Formerly RCW 36.98.030.]

Severability—1967 ex.s. c 144: "If any provision of this 1967 amendatory act, or its application to any person or circumstance is held invalid, the remainder of the act, or the application of the provision to other persons or circumstances, shall not be affected." [ 1967 ex.s. c 144 s 21.]

Severability—1967 ex.s. c 144: "If any provision of this 1967 amendatory act, or its application to any person or circumstance is held invalid, the remainder of the act, or the application of the provision to other persons or circumstances, shall not be affected." [ 1967 ex.s. c 144 s 21.]

RCW 36.900.040

Repeals and saving.

See 1963 c 4 s 36.98.040.
